title: Single of The Week: Best Coast- When I’m With You
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/bestcoast_press-1-740x404.jpg "bestcoast_press-1")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/2069-single-of-the-week-best-coast-when-i%e2%80%99m-with-you/attachment/bestcoast_press-1)

**Best Coast’s** debut album _‘Crazy For You’_ is a beauty. 13 songs of pure sun kissed fuzz;  it’s heart achingly honest and toe-tappingly lovely, as all surf-pop should be. The record is managing to achieve critical and commercial success, gaining fans such as **Thurston Moore** and **Bill Murray**; not bad for a first LP.

_‘When I’m With You’_ is the highlight for many. Full of beautiful harmonies and low-fidelity fuzz, it captures perfectly the painful innocence of the album. So here it is for you to enjoy/re-enjoy, depending on your persuasion.
